addons.label: Default Themes
addons.description: The classic green/red felt tables and some basic simple deck styles.

addons.label: Basic Themes
addons.description: Simple table and deck styles, four of each.

addons.label: Cyberpunk
addons.description: Adds cyberpunk table and deck styles. The Neon Vibe deck has unique effects if 'worn cards' are enabled. Special effects are recommended.

addons.label: Dark Elegance
addons.description: Adds dark elegance table and deck styles.

addons.label: Luxe Collection
addons.description: Adds luxe table and deck styles.

addons.label: Wildlife
addons.description: Adds wildlife-inspired table and deck styles. The Open Ocean table combined with special effects will take your breath away.

addons.label: Premium Themes
addons.description: Adds premium table and deck styles. Special effects are highly recommended.

addons.label: Special Effects
addons.description: Adds visual effects and polish. Can be distracting for some players, but man alive do they look cool.

addons.label: Classic Faces
addons.description: Replaces the standard pattern with the classic English pattern (also known as the Anglo-Saxon or International pattern). The face cards feature easily distinguishable and recognizable scalable vector graphics made by Wikimedia user Ekirahardian.

addons.label: Worn Cards
addons.description: Adds worn card edges, faded inks, scuffed textures, desaturation. Extremely beautiful, but some cards can be a little bit difficult to read at a glance (depending on the deck style).

addons.label: Balanced Counting
addons.description: Adds balanced counting systems like Hi-Opt II, Wong Halves and Zen. You can change the counting system mid-shoe to reset the count to zero without shuffling the deck.

addons.label: Unbalanced Counting
addons.description: Adds unbalanced counting systems like Knock Out or Red 7. If you're trying to learn the KO or REKO systems, this is the one you want to track the count.
